body_html: Adding a training kwarg would be a very strong requirement, and I believe this is unnecessary. You can just do model.train() and model.eval() to switch all modules (including submodules) to train/eval mode. Alternatively, if you want to do this selectively, you can index out the relevant submodules and do that only to them. Hope this helps.

body: Adding a `training` kwarg would be a very strong requirement, and I believe this is unnecessary. You can just do `model.train()` and `model.eval()` to switch *all* modules (including submodules) to train/eval mode. Alternatively, if you want to do this selectively, you can index out the relevant submodules and do that only to them. Hope this helps.
